000221 |eMedicineSubj = med |eMedicineTopic = 1721 |MeshID = D050500 }} 'Chronic
[[pancreatitis]]' is a long-standing inflammation of the pancreas that alters
its normal structure and functions. It can present as episodes of acute
inflammation in a previously injured pancreas, or as chronic damage with
persistent pain or malabsorption.
